SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Interface ViewListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientImpl
public interface ViewListener
An interface used to represent an object of type 'listener'. In this case the interface is used by the client implementation. When the view is subject to changes the listener responds to them through a set of various methods reported in the different states, having similar, but distinct, implementations.
See Also:
  • View
  • View
  • CreationState
  • FinishingState
  • OnGoingState

    • insertUserInputIntoModel

      void insertUserInputIntoModel(Choice playerChoice)
      Through its various implementations, allows the Player to insert Tiles, in a given order (contained in Choice) into the Board .
      Parameters:
      playerChoice - the choice made by the player.

    • sendPrivateMessage

      void sendPrivateMessage(String receiver, String sender, String content)
      This method implementations allows to send private messages, while in different states, to a specified Player.
